The user initiated the conversation by requesting to add a sidebar containing navigation links to the home, about, and contact pages, to which the AI promptly agreed. Following this, the user was presented with a list of additional features to consider implementing in their project. These features included adding a search bar to find transactions by various identifiers, the inclusion of a dark/light mode toggle, a transaction history page, and the consideration of push notifications for new transactions, customization settings, and a help section with FAQs and a contact form. The user was also presented with questions regarding their preferences for the sidebar's visibility—choosing between an always-visible or an expand/collapse design—and the style of the sidebar, with options ranging from minimalistic to elaborate and eye-catching. The list of additional features also mentioned incorporating a dynamic search bar for Ethereum transactions, real-time transaction updates via push notifications, interactive charts for transaction trends, a user profile page for tracking transactions, and an FAQ and feedback form under the about and contact sections respectively. The AI confirmed the addition of the requested sidebar and sought further details about the project to tailor its assistance accordingly.
